titleStmt.title: The life and death of Mahumed, the author of the Turkish religion being an account of his tribe, parents, birth, name, education, marriages, filthiness of life, Alcoran, first proselytes, wars, doctrines, miracles, advancement, &c. / by L. Addison ... author of The present state of the Jews.
titleStmt.author: Addison, Lancelot, 1632-1703.

notesStmt.note: Another edition (1679) has title: The first state of Mahumedism, or, An account of the author and doctrines of that imposture.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
